short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the default new tab page content with any background image.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces the default new tab page with a custom background image page. You can add any image you like as a background image for the new tab page.
